title: About QuakeSafe
subtitle: Empowering communities with real-time earthquake information and comprehensive preparedness resources to build resilience against seismic hazards.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: QuakeSafe aims to reduce the impact of earthquakes by providing accessible, real-time seismic information and evidence-based preparedness resources. We believe that informed communities are safer communities.

realtime.title: Real-time Data
realtime.description: Live earthquake information from the U.S. Geological Survey (USGS)

safety.title: Safety First
safety.description: Comprehensive preparedness guides and safety information

community.title: Community Focus
community.description: Resources for individuals, families, and communities

reliable.title: Reliable Sources
reliable.description: Information from trusted government agencies and experts

disclaimer.title: Important Disclaimer
disclaimer.text1: QuakeSafe is an informational resource and should not be used as the sole source for emergency decision-making. Always follow official guidance from local authorities and emergency management agencies.
disclaimer.text2: Earthquake data is provided by third-party sources and may contain delays or inaccuracies. For the most current and authoritative information, consult official government sources.
disclaimer.text3: This application is not affiliated with or endorsed by any government agency. All data is publicly available and used for educational and informational purposes.

contact.title: Stay Connected
contact.text: QuakeSafe is committed to improving earthquake preparedness for everyone. Your feedback helps us serve the community better.
contact.footer: For technical issues or feedback, please contact your local emergency management office or visit the USGS website for the most up-to-date information.
